name: qucat-circuit-generator
description: A project for generating and testing circuits

scripts.copy: cp -r assets dist/assets && cp src/gui/gui.html dist/
scripts.build: npm run menu:build && npm run bundle && npm run copy && npm run menu:build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:clean && npx jsdoc -c docs/jsdoc.conf.json -t node_modules/docdash
scripts.docs:copy-assets: cp -r dist/static docs/ && cp -r dist/assets docs/
scripts.docs:full: npm run build && npm run docs:copy-assets && npm run docs:build
scripts.docs:serve: npm run docs:build && cd docs/dist/extension-api && python3 -m http.server 8081 || php -S localhost:8081
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build && npm run docs:build && mkdir -p deploy && cp -r dist/* deploy/ && cp -r docs deploy/ && cp index.html deploy/
scripts.deploy:serve: npm run deploy:prepare && cd deploy && python3 -m http.server 8080
